duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise on-site construction including scheduling subcontractors, inspectors, and suppliers
Manage the construction of assigned homes from foundation to close, including 30-day warranty signoff
Oversee and monitor all daily trade functions for timeliness, quality of workmanship, and completion of work
Assist in ordering all materials required to construct houses
Schedule and attend all necessary municipal inspections and assist inspectors with the completion of the review

education_certification.credential: Minimum 3 years residential construction experience with knowledge of construction processes including scheduling and managing scheduling issues
